message:
docs: update link (#44017)

files.patch: @@ -26,8 +26,6 @@ There are a few key techniques and patterns that you can apply to future proof a ### Follow the AngularJS Style Guide -{@a follow-the-angular-styleguide} - The [AngularJS Style Guide][GithubJohnpapaAngularStyleguideBlobPrimaryA1ReadmeMd] collects patterns and practices that have been proven to result in cleaner and more maintainable AngularJS applications.
